item.title: Onshape
item.description: Why Onshape? Onshape is a full-cloud parametric CAD system that runs in your browser. This means that your document is stored in the cloud, and if you’re working on a group project, everyone edits a single copy of the document, real-time. No more sending one person off to do all the CAD or dealing with whether “Version 1 Final Actual Final” or “Final Version 1” is the more recent copy.
